verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* fornication \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w in|strong="H8033"\w* \w their|strong="H8033"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* fornication: \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w their|strong="H8033"\w* \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* \w pressed|strong="H4600"\w* down, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H2181"\w* teats \w of|strong="H4714"\w* \w their|strong="H8033"\w* \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w bruised|strong="H4600"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* Oolla \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w elder|strong="H1419"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ooliba \w her|strong="H1961"\w* younger \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* Oolla, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* Ooliba.

\w And|strong="H0157"\w* Oolla \w committed|strong="H5921"\w* fornication \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0157"\w* doted \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Assyrians \w that|strong="H0413"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* were \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, princes, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, beautiful youths, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, \w mounted|strong="H7392"\w* \w upon|strong="H3847"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w committed|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* fornications \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* chosen \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Assyrians: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w herself|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* uncleanness \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* doted.

Moreover \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* fornications which \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* bruised \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w breasts|strong="H1717"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* fornication \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Assyrians, \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* lust \w she|strong="H0834"\w* doted.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* discovered \w her|strong="H1540"\w* disgrace, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w with|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* infamous \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* executed \w judgments|strong="H8196"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* Ooliba \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* this, she \w was|strong="H0269"\w* mad \w with|strong="H4480"\w* \w lust|strong="H8457"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* she: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* she carried \w her|strong="H7200"\w* fornication \w beyond|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fornication \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.

Impudently prostituting herself \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Assyrians, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*, \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* divers colours, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* great beauty.

\w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H0259"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w took|strong="H8147"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* she \w increased|strong="H3254"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* fornications: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* she \w had|strong="H0376"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* painted \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w images|strong="H6754"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w set|strong="H2707"\w* forth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* colours,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w girded|strong="H2289"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* girdles \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* reins, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* dyed \w turbans|strong="H2871"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* resemblance \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w captains|strong="H7218"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* wherein \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H4138"\w*,

She doted \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lust \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* she \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* fornications, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* she \w was|strong="H1121"\w* polluted \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* glutted \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* discovered \w her|strong="H1540"\w* fornications, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* discovered \w her|strong="H1540"\w* disgrace: \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w alienated|strong="H5361"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w alienated|strong="H5361"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0776"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w her|strong="H3117"\w* fornications, \w remembering|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H3117"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w played|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1320"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* mad \w with|strong="H5921"\w* lust \w after|strong="H5921"\w* lying \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* asses: \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w issue|strong="H2231"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w issue|strong="H2231"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* thou hast renewed \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w* \w of|strong="H4616"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w when|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* pressed \w in|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* papa \w of|strong="H4616"\w* thy virginity broken.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, Ooliba, \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w raise|strong="H5782"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w all|strong="H5439"\w* thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* glutted: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* gather \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nobles, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kings, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* princes, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Assyrians, beautiful \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w captains|strong="H6346"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* princes, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* renowned \w horsemen|strong="H5483"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee well \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w wheel|strong="H1534"\w*, \w a|strong="H5414"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w armed|strong="H4043"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* breastplate, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w helmet|strong="H6959"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thee \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* \w against|strong="H0854"\w* thee, \w which|strong="H2719"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w execute|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H0784"\w* thee \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w cut|strong="H5493"\w* \w off|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w nose|strong="H0639"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w remains|strong="H5307"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy residue \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w by|strong="H0784"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* they \w shall|strong="H3627"\w* \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* thee \w of|strong="H3627"\w* thy \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w put|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* end \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy fornication \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w*.
